## StyleCollector class

StyleCollector is used to collect all styles from a page and return a BuildResultInterface with the result.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class StyleCollector 
```

## Example

const styleCollector = new StyleCollector(); const result = styleCollector.collect(component); if (result.success) { // do something with the result }
